p: RRV plaques on cell layers stained 40 hr post-incubation were clearly distinguishable and easily counted when plates were scanned and images enlarged. There was a significant correlation (R 2 = 0.65; P<0.0001) between percent neutralisation of RRV pfu noted in koala samples characterized by micro-PRNT or PRNT techniques ( Fig 2). In comparison to the standard PRNT, the sensitivity and specificity of the micro-PRNT was 88.2% and 96% respectively. Those differences in percent neutralisation determined between methods were not significant ( p > 0.05; paired samples t-test).
